hanzi-su-wiki:
駐

Значения

Останавливаться, задерживаться; располагаться

Мнемоника

  • Если путник на лошади 馬 заметит огонь светильника (как 主), он остановится на ночлег.

  • "Хозяин 主 и его лошадь 馬 остановятся здесь."

Варианты

驻
purpleculture_pinyin:
zhù
to halt; to stay; to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
остановиться; остаться; быть размещенным (войск, дипломатов и т. д.)
rtega_mnemonic:
駐駐RS
驻驻		be stationed at, reside at, stop
  • the horse 馬 stops where his master 主 resides or is stationed
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 驻)
Pictophonetic: 主 indicates the sound; 馬 (horse) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
駐華 [ zhù huá ]: stationed in China; located in China
駐地 [ zhù dì ]: station; encampment
駐軍 [ zhù jūn ]: to station or garrison troops; garrison
駐紮 [ zhù zhā ]: to station; to garrison (troops)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 馬 [ mǎ ] horse; surname
    • 主 [ zhǔ ] to own; to host; master; host; lord
heisig_chinese_memo: To be stationed (to park) in the dark may be difficult... especially if you're parking a trojan horse. To lend you a tiny bit of help, take this candlestick with you, and at least you'll have some light.
heisig_constituent: stop-over, parking, team of horses, candlestick, lord, drop, king, jewel, ball
koohiiStory1: In the olden days you had to park your horse next to a candlestick, a primitive parking meter that you start by lighting a fire and tracks the time by burning down.
koohiiStory2: In the olden days parking lots used to have reserved spaces for where the lord (of the set of houses, shops, whatever) could park his team of horses. nowadays it´s pretty much the same...reserved parking in front for the big bosses´ cars....
jp_example_words:
駐車(ちゅうしゃ): parking (e.g. car)
駐車場(ちゅうしゃじょう): parking lot
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A horse is your master and you are merely a resident in his house. How did this horse become your master? Those aren’t questions a resident should ask! Know your place, resident!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine having a horse as your master. Hear him neigh out orders to you and the other residents of the horse master’s house.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: To prove yourself a worthy resident of the horse master’s house, you must capture Chewbacca (ちゅう). Your horse master collects rare creatures, and Chewbacca is his latest desire. If you wish to remain a resident of the house, you must capture Chewbacca.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine Chewbacca in a cage in the horse master’s house. You’ve proved yourself a worthy resident. Hear Chewbacca making his Wookie sounds as he bashes against the bars of his new cage.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the master (主) with the horse (馬) stops over
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A long time ago the police in a city would ride horses and be stationed at locations marked by large candles.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " horse " to " main " sound. The original meaning is to stop the carriage. "Said Wen": "Zhu, Ma Liye. From Ma, the main voice." Such as "Han Shu. Yan Zhu Wuqiu's Father Xu Yanzhuan Wang Jia Chuan": "(Zhu) Maichen parked in the car, and after calling his husband and wife, went to the prefectural residence, placed in the garden, and fed them." "New Tang Book. "Li Sheng's Biography": "Emperor Zhi Ziliang, Sheng sees the Three Bridges with his uniform, and the emperor is stationed in Marao."

The extension of " resident " means staying and stopping. Such as "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "Liu Ye Biography": "Looking forward to see you, to discuss the matter, and to return, stay for a few days." Eastern Jin Ge Hong "Shenxian Biography. "Liu Gen": "Various herbs and plants can cure all diseases, invigorate deficiency and maintain beauty, break valleys and replenish qi." "Zhuyan" means to stop the appearance of aging.

" Station " also means that the army is stationed and stationed. Such as "Hou Han Shu. Liu Yu Gongsun Zan Tao Qian's Biographies: "It is hard to guarantee victory and defeat. It is better to garrison troops and approach them with military force. Zan will repent and apologize. The so-called "Song History." "The Book of Emperor Gaozong": "The Reform Movement of 1898, Zhao Mengyu, Han Shizhong class teacher, Yue Fei Tun stationed in Jiangzhou."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " horse " to the " master " sound. The original meaning is to stop the carriage.
humanum_full_description:
從「馬」，「主」聲。本義是車馬停止。《說文》：「駐，馬立也。从馬，主聲。」如《漢書．嚴朱吾丘主父徐嚴終王賈傳》：「（朱）買臣駐車，呼令後車載其夫妻，到太守舍，置園中，給食之。」《新唐書．李晟傳》：「帝至自梁，晟以戎服見三橋，帝駐馬勞之。」

　　「駐」引申表示停留、停止。如《三國志．魏書．劉曄傳》：「曄往見，為論事埶，要將與歸，駐止數日。」東晉葛洪《神仙傳．劉根》：「草木諸藥，能治百病，補虛駐顏，斷穀益氣。」「駐顏」意謂停止容顏衰老。

　　「駐」還表示軍隊駐扎、駐守。如《後漢書．劉虞公孫瓚陶謙列傳》：「加勝敗難保，不如駐兵，以武臨之，瓚必悔禍謝罪，所謂不戰而服人者也。」《宋史．高宗本紀》：「戊戌，詔孟庾、韓世忠班師，岳飛屯駐江州。」
humanum_short_description: 從「馬」，「主」聲。本義是車馬停止。

②部隊或外勤工作人員住在執行職務的地方；部門、單位派出的機構在某地：駐紮。駐守。駐防。駐外使節。

從「 馬 」，「 主 」聲。本義是車馬停止。《說文》：「駐，馬立也。从馬，主聲。」如《漢書．嚴朱吾丘主父徐嚴終王賈傳》：「（朱）買臣駐車，呼令後車載其夫妻，到太守舍，置園中，給食之。」《新唐書．李晟傳》：「帝至自梁，晟以戎服見三橋，帝駐馬勞之。」 「 駐 」引申表示停留、停止。如《三國志．魏書．劉曄傳》：「曄往見，為論事埶，要將與歸，駐止數日。」東晉葛洪《神仙傳．劉根》：「草木諸藥，能治百病，補虛駐顏，斷穀益氣。」「駐顏」意謂停止容顏衰老。 「 駐 」還表示軍隊駐扎、駐守。如《後漢書．劉虞公孫瓚陶謙列傳》：「加勝敗難保，不如駐兵，以武臨之，瓚必悔禍謝罪，所謂不戰而服人者也。」《宋史．高宗本紀》：「戊戌，詔孟庾、韓世忠班師，岳飛屯駐江州。」

Yan Zhu Wuqiu's Father Xu Yanzhuan Wang Jia Chuan": "(Zhu) Maichen parked in the car, and after calling his husband and wife, went to the prefectural residence, placed in the garden, and fed them." "New Tang Book. "Li Sheng's Biography": "Emperor Zhi Ziliang, Sheng sees the Three Bridges with his uniform, and the emperor is stationed in Marao." The extension of " resident" means staying and stopping. Such as "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "Liu Ye Biography": "Looking forward to see you, to discuss the matter, and to return, stay for a few days." Eastern Jin Ge Hong "Shenxian Biography. "Liu Gen": "Various herbs and plants can cure all diseases, invigorate deficiency and maintain beauty, break valleys and replenish qi." "Zhuyan" means to stop the appearance of aging. " Station" also means that the army is stationed and stationed. Such as "Hou Han Shu. Liu Yu Gongsun Zan Tao Qian's Biographies: "It is hard to guarantee victory and defeat. It is better to garrison troops and approach them with military force. Zan will repent and apologize. 駐字的基本解释

駐
zhù
见“驻”。

駐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhù］
［《廣韻》中句切，去遇，知。］
“驻1”的繁体字。
(1)车马停止。
(2)停留。
(3)止住；阻止。
(4)留住。
(5)居留其地。
(6)指居住。

駐字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駐； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1436第02
【唐韻】中句切【集韻】【韻會】株遇切，?音注。【說文】馬立也。【玉篇】馬止也。【釋名】駐，株也，如株木不動。【正字通】天子行在之所曰駐蹕。　又【集韻】㕑遇切，音柱。義同。

駐字的源字形

小篆楷体

暂无。

zhù
вм. 驻

駐

Значения

Останавливаться, задерживаться; располагаться

Мнемоника

  • Если путник на лошади 馬 заметит огонь светильника (как 主), он остановится на ночлег.

  • "Хозяин 主 и его лошадь 馬 остановятся здесь."

Варианты

驻

Radicals: 馬, 主  (horse, master)
Meaning Mnemonic
A horse is your master and you are merely a resident in his house. How did this horse become your master? Those aren’t questions a resident should ask! Know your place, resident!
Imagine having a horse as your master. Hear him neigh out orders to you and the other residents of the horse master’s house.
Reading Mnemonic
To prove yourself a worthy resident of the horse master’s house, you must capture Chewbacca (ちゅう). Your horse master collects rare creatures, and Chewbacca is his latest desire. If you wish to remain a resident of the house, you must capture Chewbacca.
Imagine Chewbacca in a cage in the horse master’s house. You’ve proved yourself a worthy resident. Hear Chewbacca making his Wookie sounds as he bashes against the bars of his new cage.
